## Fork and Clone the Class Repo

Fork the class repo: <https://github.com/posit-conf-2023/ds-workflows-r>

In Workbench, clone the repo as a new Project:

1.  Execute the **New Project** command (from the Project menu)
2.  Choose to create a new project from **Version Control**
3.  Choose **Git**
4.  Provide the repository URL and then click **Create Project**
